resources.string:
▪ Added brightness control to Game Booster
 ▪ Launch any app with Game Booster
 ▪ New dashboard screen
 ▪ Improved coroutines management, app should be a bit more snappier
 ▪ Improved background services execution
 ▪ Updated Turkish translations (credits: Hüseyin Küpeli)
 ▪ Fixed a bug that caused a few layouts not to adjust when changing orientation
 ▪ Updated Games database

We need your permission to perform battery-saving actions and close inactive applications. Click on continue and the settings screen will open, look for something similar to what the tutorial below shows:
This service will automatically force stop an application at its details screen once you invoke it (through HEBF only).
Forces the Doze Mode activation moments after the screen turns off, putting the device in deep sleep regardless of other previous state.
Open the Android settings screen for this application.
For this function to work smoothly, you need to clear the cache and reboot.\nWhen you press OK the device will reboot.

The Android Runtime (ART) uses ahead-of-time compilation to compile the dex code into native code at the time of installation, pre-optimizing it using the dex2oat tool so your processor can interpret the code easier.\nThis option allows you to change the dex2oat compiler filter to control how it compiles.
The ART compiler filter options were not found on your system, you can close this window or enable them at your own risk.

Use this option to control which apps can be executed on startup. By default, all apps holding the RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED permission will receive a broadcast indicating that the system finished booting.
Optimizes the Wi-Fi scan interval, enables the power saving mode, disables the error reports without performance impacts to improve your battery life.
If you found a bug or have any suggestions please feel free to send us (via email). We should respond as soon as possible.
Tweaks for the buffer size of the connection types, from LTE to GPRS. Results in a better browsing experience.
Files needed to run the application were not found on your system.
You can try and download any busybox installer app from the Google Play Store and install it from there.
Busybox assures us that all commands will run on all Android versions.

Toggles the captive portal detection. If turned on, the system will try to check the connection quality in order to detect connectivity.\nIf turned off, the system will aways believe that the connection is healthy and will not draw the \"exclamation mark\" over the strength icon.
Use the floating button to scan your storage for possible excludable files. After the scan is complete, a list of options will be provided. Make your selections and use the same button to clean
Are you absolutely sure what you\'re doing?
Houston, we\'ve had a problem… It looks like the app crashed the last time it was run. You can notify the developers about this or ignore.
Try again after restarting the app, if the error persists, contact the support.
A dark wallpaper can help saving battery on AMOLED screens by reducing the amount of pixels turned on
Are you sure you want to delete your account? Your data will not be preserved. After the operation, you will be disconnected.
A custom DNS can improve speed, response and security. It and can also allow you to access blocked websites and bypass some censorship filters of your network, depending of your location.
%1$s has been added to the blacklist
Sorry, this app cannot be blacklisted for now…
Wait approximately %1$s minutes before entering in %2$s mode
Fsync ensures that all data be written to the storage device, it waits until the device reports that the transfer has completed, preventing data loss if the system crashes. (Which may cause delays).
There are values missing, please check the text fields.
The size of the entropy pool, i.e., the maximum reachable value.
Indicates the minimum entropy that must be available before it can be read. This does not affect /dev/urandom.

Entropy is a measure of available random characters generated by the kernel. This randomness is provided through the interfaces /dev/random and /dev/urandom and used on several tasks. Most cryptography tasks will demand \"good quality\" randomness while other tasks are most likely be interested on speed only.
Indicates how low the entropy pool must be for devices be allowed to write to the entropy pool, not necessarily increasing it.
Failed to read storage. Necessary permission denied.
You command, we obey. Nothing will be hidden.
Speeds up battery charging via USB when connected to a PC or notebook.
Your device will be rebooted into bootloader mode.
Tap the bottom button to complete the application setup.
Force the use of English language in application
Adjusts the minimum number of video frame periods per buffer swap to prevent the \"frame tearing\" (when you see half of one frame and half of another)
Discards (\"trims\") unused blocks on a mounted filesystem, reducing time needed to access it. It is recommended that you fstrim at least once in a week.

Fsync synchronizes a file\'s in-core state with the storage device so that all changed information can be retrieved even after the system crashed or was rebooted.\nFor safety, if you disable it, make sure you have a proper backup.
Control extra behavior of the game booster. Toggle options here to match your needs.
Improve your performance in games by setting system parameters before opening the game.
Enables the hardware accelerated UI, forces GPU screen composing and disables the vsync for a much better performance at the cost of battery.

HEBF Optimizer is an application that aims to increase the performance of your device, also by focusing on battery performance, we didn\'t forget it.\nThe application also features a useful and intelligent toolbox that you can use whenever you want.

▪ Reiny Zamayuti (TjReiny): Tips, suggestions, testing, review
 ▪ Jamiéric Gomes: Color, Material Design and layout tips
▪ Guilherme Augusto: Color, images and layout suggestions and analysis 
▪ Rivaldo Freitas: Color and layout suggestions
▪ Gominha: Bricks and layout suggestions
▪ Vinícius Nery (VinyX): Colors suggestions, Brazil >>> All
▪ Wesley Júnior (SH4D0W): Tips and suggestions
.
Changes the hostname (the device\'s name when connected to a Wi-Fi or Ethernet network).
Service is scheduled to run every %1$s hours
Are you sure you want to replace all of your data by importing this configuration file?
Restart the app (remove it from the Recent Apps) to apply changes
Please enter a valid email address
The password must contain at least 6 characters
Welcome! This guide will help you through the application setup process
…And full battery, in a moment of a loving disillusion, on top of this, my device\'s battery was discharging fast, so I started working on HEBF with a empty heart and a full battery. \n– Ivson Emídio
Forget the past and join the club
It seems that you have no option to enable.
Try again with another custom kernel.
Crucial for low RAM devices, the KSM merges two kernel pages if they are found to have same data, helping the user to get more free space for the applications.
Optimizes the touch pressure scale and animations duration for improved user interface elements.
Applications that provides the content needed for the Android and the applications to work, i.e the data.
Cached applications that you finished. Android still keeps them in memory in order to open them again faster.
Application with which the user is actively interacting.
Processes in idle, inactive but with a reserved space in case it is needed by an alive running application.
Services needed by some applications. The Android keeps them alive in a space in RAM in case they are needed to do something.
LMK is a set of parameters that sets the limits at which applications are killed in order to free RAM. Set the value to the levels below in megabytes.
Paused applications that are not in the foreground but are somehow still visible to the user (floating windows, for instance).
If you don\'t want to see the Android striving to record everything that is happening in all applications, enable this option
There is no user with this email address

This option flags the device as a low RAM one, turning off specific memory-intensive features (status bar tinting, notification panel background effect etc) which works poorly on low-memory devices.\n\nIf disabled, you may need to REBOOT to apply the changes.
These features require a custom kernel. If your kernel does not support one of them, it will remain hidden.
Affectionately nicknamed Mitch by the developers, it symbolizes the resurrection of an old version of HEBF
Please allow HEBF modify settings, it is needed to change the brightness, click OK, and then confirm again.
Improves various TCP values for the IPv4 protocol such as timeout and sockets re-use.
OK, we will hide potentially risky options.
A Kernel Panic is when the system detects a fatal hardware error from which it can\'t recover and then it shuts down to prevent physical damage. Disabling it may avoid random reboots.
An email for password recovery has been sent to %s.

Enables the performance tuning mode, decreases the colors number to 16bpp (16 bits per pixel) and optimizes the \"fling\" velocity (smooth scroll) for a general improvement with minimal impact on battery.
Please log in with your account
Please wait, this may take up to 1 minute.
This unique purchase offers extra features such as unlimited application selections to force-stop, custom service scheduling and the AppOps Manager
Please consider purchasing HEBF Optimizer Pro in order to user this feature
HEBF Optimizer Premium Package is available for only %s for a limited time!
Current Billing API version is not supported for the type requested
Requested feature is not supported by Google Play Store on this current device
Failed to purchase since item is already owned
Requested product is not available for purchase
Failed to establish connection, please try again
Leave your review on the Google Play Store
Your device will be rebooted into recovery.
I\'ve read and accept the terms and conditions
This email address is already in use
Optimizes the screen composition properties and enables overlay UI mode for a better graphics quality.
Please allow HEBF create windows, to reduce visual clutter while hibernating apps

Storage permission will be used to:
 - Make backups
 - Retrieve the wallpaper
 - Generate logs
Resets the battery statistics and makes the system recreate them. Try this if the behavior of the system in relation to the battery seems strange.
Are you sure you want to replace all your data by restoring this backup?
Tap to retrieve purchases from server
Reduces the delay to receive or end a call.
HEBF needs root access in order to work. Please ensure that you have superuser privileges and click on the button \"Next\"
Improves the scrolling responsiveness and speed.
Your device will be shut down.
Improves a set of RIL and HSDPA properties, prefix and GPRS classes to improve the quality of the connection.
Learn basic scripting, how to execute scripts, mod building guide, where we took inspiration and some initial knowledge. Thanks, you are somewhere in our empty heart.
We also use some open source scripts made by own paget96 and with contributions from several members of the developer community.
Tweaks for the stagefright (the Android media library, not the bug). Results in smoother video streams.
Get the best gaming experience now!
Your SystemUi.apk will be restarted and the phone will be locked.
Wake up your device with a double tap on the screen, similar to Knock On of some LG devices.
Tap here if you don\'t want to sign in now
What type of user are you?
Change the user type to show / hide risky options
This option may slow down your device.
Turn off when charger is connected
Disable the service when connecting the charger
Control extra behavior of the VIP battery saver. Toggle options here to match your needs.

Put your device into a deep battery saving mode by setting the CPU governor along with several other parameters of your choice. This is useful when you want to lose the minimum battery level on your way home, for instance.
The interval in milliseconds to issue wake up scans when Wi-Fi needs to connect.\nDefault: 300000ms.
The interval in milliseconds after which Wi-Fi is considered idle.\nDefault: 30000ms.
Allows scans to be enabled even if Wi-Fi is turned off for connectivity.
The interval in milliseconds to scan as used by the Wi-Fi supplicant.\nDefault: 15000ms.
Optimizes the android package files (and its uncompressed data) to reduce the amount of RAM consumed when running an application.
Your temporary package has expired! Purchase premium package now to keep using its features.

The strings.xml file contains the text used in this application. You can copy the translation file to your storage if you want to translate it using your phone. Once you\'re done translating, just send us back through our email support.

If you prefer, you can get the same file on GitHub with the difference of being able to see the files already translated. Download the files directly from there or fork the project, then you just need to open a pull-request when you finish translating.

Thank you for your interest in translating this app, here are some tips: - If you need to use quotation marks, place a backslash before each - \\n means a line break, keep in mind - Do not translate %s, %1$s, %2$d etc. They represent variable data that will be shown when the app is running.
The logical density of the display, a scaling factor for the DIP unit.
The screen size (width x height) in pixels.

If set incorrectly, these settings can make onscreen content disproportionate or limit touch areas. Make sure you know what you are doing before applying any changes here.\nIf you lose access to the screen, you can execute this command in an ADB shell to reset everything: \"wm density reset && wm size reset\"
Do you want to keep these changes? They will be automatically reverted back in %d seconds.
Set the preferred operational wifi frequency band to 5GHz. Can cause battery drain in some firmwares.
Busybox not found. Some operations may not work properly.
Helps you track the most battery consuming features of your device and enable battery saving ones.
Select the feature with which you want to configure Tasker
Creates a compressed block device in RAM that will be used for swapping instead of the slower swap partition, allowing faster data exchange.

If you previously bought the old \"HEBF Optimizer Pro\" app, you must sign in to verify your purchase and unlock all the features. Sign in now to take advantage of the app\'s sharing functions and everything else the we offer.

Since he was born, André Luis fights against Epidermolysis Bullosa, a rare disease that currently has no cure. Heat, pain, and disabilities are just a few things that André has to come through every day as his clinical condition has worsened very recently. If you can, please help him buy the medicines he needs!
Make the IO from the storage contribute with more randomness to the entropy pool.
Number of seconds after which the deterministic random number generators will be reseeded.
Used to get the current foreground app
Used to change brightness and screen timeout
Get the Premium package with a special discount for limited time!
You are in rootless mode. Several options are only available with root access. Tap to request superuser rights again or swipe to dismiss.
Taking too long? Please update Google Play Services.
This application no longer supports non-rooted devices
No data available. Please enable stats collection in VIP Battery saver settings
Warning: It seems you are using an EAS kernel, if so, do not attempt to change this option.
Doze mode reduces battery consumption by deferring background CPU and network activity for apps when the device is unused for long periods of time until maintenance windows
Makes VIP collect battery information periodically for reporting purposes
Shuts off some screen pixels to reduce power consumption. Implementation is framework-dependent.
Activates android\'s default power save mode independent of battery level
Change the CPU governor when turned on
Activates the grayscale mode to conserve power. Warning: this will override any colorblind mode or previous KCAL setting.
Forces device-idle mode immediately independently of any previous state.
Force stop apps when turned on
